name: TabController
description: A performant solution for a tab controller with lazy load mechanism

props.name: items
props.description: The list of tab bar items

props.name: onChangeIndex
props.description: Callback for when index has change (will not be called on ignored items)

props.name: asCarousel
props.description: When using TabController.PageCarousel this should be turned on

props.name: nestedInScrollView
props.description: Pass when TabController is render inside a ScrollView (with a header)

props.name: carouselPageWidth
props.description: Pass for custom carousel page width

props.name: useSafeArea
props.description: Send if a SafeView is used in the context of the TabController
